mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_O_PATH, FILE_V_PATH, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE FROM JR_DB.BOARD_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{BOARD_TYPE} AND BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JR_DB.BOARD_FILE ( FILE_O_PATH, FILE_V_PATH, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{FILE_O_PATH}, #{FILE_V_PATH}, #{BOARD_NO}, #{BOARD_TYPE} )
